channel.title: Posts on A place for adventures and experiments
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A place for adventures and experiments

item.title: Qrp
item.description: I get some flack for liking QRP so much. Recently I went to a local park and worked a station from Poland on just six watts. This was my first voice DX QRP contact. The feeling was quite amazing, I’ll never forget it. While at the park I had no cell service. I pay about 50 USD a month for cell service. However I took a radio out of a sherpa pack and talked to a man over four thousand miles away for free.
item.content: I get some flack for liking QRP so much. Recently I went to a local park and worked a station from Poland on just six watts. This was my first voice DX QRP contact. The feeling was quite amazing, I’ll never forget it. While at the park I had no cell service. I pay about 50 USD a month for cell service. However I took a radio out of a sherpa pack and talked to a man over four thousand miles away for free. I was running the FT-817 on it’s internal battery. I have upgraded the battery from the standard siCad

item.title: Ken_thompson
item.description:
Ken Thompson One of this first Unix cowboys created Go. My old blog was in Python. We will see how this goes… I recetnly watched this
He did a lot with Bell and the early groundwork for Unix at Berkeley. It’s pretty late so I will write more on this in the morning.
item.content:
Ken Thompson One of this first Unix cowboys created Go. My old blog was in Python. We will see how this goes… I recetnly watched this

He did a lot with Bell and the early groundwork for Unix at Berkeley. It’s pretty late so I will write more on this in the morning.

item.title: Sk
item.description: You never told me goodbye. I’m still mad.
item.content: You never told me goodbye. I’m still mad.

item.title: Covid 19
item.description: This site will include article and information about my adventures in armature radio. I have many other hobbies that intersect with radio. We can enjoy them together. Hopefully it will help me remember things also. Some of my QRP FT8 POTA This is a time of global pandemic. I don’t watch a lot of news about the virus. Right now I’m watching Mortal Kombat from 1997. I hope the bands get more active, from bored hams stuck at home.
item.content:
This site will include article and information about my adventures in armature radio. I have many other hobbies that intersect with radio. We can enjoy them together. Hopefully it will help me remember things also. Some of my QRP FT8 POTA

This is a time of global pandemic. I don’t watch a lot of news about the virus. Right now I’m watching Mortal Kombat from 1997. I hope the bands get more active, from bored hams stuck at home. I have made a lot of progress on NOT isolating myself latley. Now with this virus this is mandatory to stop the spread. Radio has been a great hobby for me these past two years. It gets me out of the house and helps me connect with people. more activite
